author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Regeneron Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $5.23
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* REGENERON REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $5.23 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.50 * REGENERON PHARMACEUTICALS - Q4 GAAP NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE INCLUDES CHARGE OF $2.82/DILUTED SHARE IN CONNECTION WITH U.S. TAX REFORM LEGISLATION
* SEES, IN FY 2018, SANOFI COLLABORATION REVENUE OF $450 MILLION TO $500 MILLION
* Q4 EYLEA (AFLIBERCEPT) INJECTION U.S. NET SALES INCREASED 14% TO $975 MILLION VERSUS Q4 2016
* SEES FY 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $420 MILLION TO $500 MILLION
* REGENERON PHARMA - TOTAL REVENUES, WHICH INCLUDE PRODUCT REVENUES , INCREASED BY 29% TO $1.582 BILLION IN Q4
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.53, REVENUE VIEW $1.50 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
